comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Baseball club owner in Philadelphia Carpenter Will Quit for $1500. New York Times - Jan 7, 1914 ... of club owners to agree with President Charles F. Carpenter regarding terms of his retirement. Another meeting will be held in Philadelphia on Jan. 20. ... I started an entry for him in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_F._Carpenter

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Charles Carpenter was President of the Tri-State Baseball League. Club owners in the league were trying to oust him two years before his contract expired. Very brief New York Times story on January 7, 1914, discussed the negotiations in progress: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9E05E5DF1E39E6...
